channel.title: Making a Chest open with a key (718)
channel.description: hey guys im using rune-evo and im making some npcs drop a key. how would i manage to make the key open a chest and receive a random reward, i found a pi tutorial on this but its no use for a 718. Does any1 have any ideas?

item.title: Making a Chest open with a key (718)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Use an if statement when the player clicks the chest…

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Chest open with a key (718)

item.title: Making a Chest open with a key (718)
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

How do i add that line of code where the chest gives the player a random reward after the player uses that key on it? thats what i need to know and i cant find it in my objecthandler so i have to add it, what is the code?

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Chest open with a key (718)

item.title: Making a Chest open with a key (718)
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Then do like I said above minus the object part.

tyb97:

Access the packet handler that receives data when you use one item on an object, now run a check to see if the key item id and the chest object id are the once you want, swap the closed chest object with the model of the opened one, and give the player the items you want to give him.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Chest open with a key (718)

item.title: Making a Chest open with a key (718)
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

tyb97:

There is a packet that transforms one object to another, figure this out, the opened chest is a completely different object than the closed one.

the chest is closed, its ok if its closed id perfer it closed. i just want it so when a pleyer uses a key on it it just gives them a reward. it can stay closed

Read full topic

item.title: Making a Chest open with a key (718)
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:512136”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=630379.msg4272700#msg4272700 date=1364668957]
just make a code so if they click the key they get a random item.
[/quote]
No just no…

Access the packet handler that receives data when you use one item on an object, now run a check to see if the key item id and the chest object id are the once you want, swap the closed chest object with the model of the opened one, and give the player the items you want to give him.[/quote]
i had to spawn my chest via objects, theres no existing code in my objecthandler that has an openable chest, i want to know how to add that so when i have the key the chest will open and then give me rewards.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Chest open with a key (718)

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Host Gushers:

just make a code so if they click the key they get a random item.

No just no…

Access the packet handler that receives data when you use one item on an object, now run a check to see if the key item id and the chest object id are the once you want, swap the closed chest object with the model of the opened one, and give the player the items you want to give him.
